sentences.english: He said the more he ate, the more he farted.
He said the more he ate, the more he farted.
The closer they are to me, the mre I like them.
sentences.chinese: 愈是跟我亲近的人，我愈是喜欢他们。

sentences.english: The closer a society's population growth rate gets to zero, the more population aging it will be.
sentences.chinese: 一个社会的人口增加率越接近零，其人口便愈老龄化。

sentences.english: Nowadays in the USA, more and more young people are losing interest in politics.
sentences.chinese: 现在的美国，越来愈多的年轻人对政治丧失了兴趣。

sentences.english: Wish our comities in the happiness festival the longer the newer.
sentences.chinese: 在欢乐的节日里，愿我们的友谊愈久愈新。

sentences.english: Why then is he not being healed of cancer?
sentences.chinese: 那为什么现在他无法愈痊癌症？

sentences.english: The mallards seemed like the colder it was the better in the pond.
sentences.chinese: 池中野鸭是愈冷愈游得起劲儿。

sentences.english: Love begins with a smile, grows with a kiss and ends witha tear.
sentences.chinese: 爱其于微笑，随着亲吻而愈浓，并逝于眼泪。

sentences.english: I feel son on the so-called disease has also died and more of the basic.
sentences.chinese: 我自己感觉所谓的月子病也基本不治而愈了。

sentences.english: The more he ate, the more he farted.
sentences.chinese: 他吃的愈多，放屁也愈多。

sentences.english: Having the fewest wants, I am nearest to the gods.
sentences.chinese: 有愈少的欲望，我就愈接近神。

sentences.english: The higher up we go, the colder it becomes.
Summarized Zhang Shiqing's experience on treating infantile diarrhea not being cured for long time.
